mapper.select: select reviewnum, userid, review_content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, store_owner from review where store_owner=#{store_owner} order by reviewnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into review (reviewnum, userid, review_content, regdate, store_owner) values(reviewnum_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{review_content}, sysdate, #{store_owner})
